How many \textbf{distinguishable} rearrangements of the letters in CONTEST have both the vowels first? (For instance, OETCNST is a one such arrangements but OTETSNC is not.)\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 60\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 120\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 240\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 720\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 2520$
